Judul: THE EFFECT OF WORKING CAPITAL MANAGEMENT ON PROFITABILITY: EMPIRICAL STUDY ON CONSUMER GOODS COMPANIES IN INDONESIA 2004-2007
Abstrak: Working capital consists of current assets and currents liabilities as the resources of a company to finance its short-term financial management. This research is aimed to analyze the effect of working capital management on profitability of companies listed on Indonesia Stock Exchange in four-year period from 2003 up to 2007. The scope of this research is all of the listed consumer goods companies in Indonesia Stock Exchange. In acquiring the accurate relationship, this research will use multiple regression models. Besides examining all of the consumer goods companies, it also considers he classification of five industries in consumer goods based on Indonesia Stock Exchange.
Kata Kunci: working capital management, cash conversion cycle, profitability
